name: Veggie Stir Fry
description: Colorful stir-fried vegetables in a savory sauce
instructions: Add garlic and ginger, sauté briefly
Add veggies and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes
Add soy sauce and sesame oil
Serve hot over rice or noodles

name: Caprese Salad
description: Simple and fresh Italian salad with tomatoes and mozzarella
instructions: Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze
Sprinkle salt and pepper to taste

name: Vegetable Biryani
description: Spiced rice dish packed with vegetables
instructions: Fry onions and vegetables with spices
Layer rice and veggies in a pot
Cover and cook on low for 15 mins

name: Paneer Tikka
description: Grilled paneer cubes marinated in spices
instructions: Mix yogurt, spices, and lemon juice
Marinate paneer in the mixture for 1 hour
Grill or bake at 200°C for 15 minutes

name: Spinach Lasagna
description: Cheesy vegetarian lasagna with spinach
instructions: Mix ricotta, spinach, salt, and pepper
Layer sauce, noodles, and cheese mix

name: Vegetarian Omelette
description: Egg-free chickpea flour omelette with veggies
instructions: Mix chickpea flour, water, turmeric, and salt into a batter
Heat oil in a non-stick pan
Pour batter and spread like a pancake
Cook both sides until golden brown

name: Avocado Toast
description: Crispy toast topped with creamy avocado and spices
instructions: Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper

name: Banana Oat Pancakes
description: Healthy pancakes made with bananas and oats
instructions: Blend all ingredients into a smooth batter
Heat a non-stick pan and grease lightly
Pour batter and cook on both sides until golden
Serve with honey or maple syrup

name: Poha
description: Flattened rice cooked with onions, peas, and spices
ingredients: Lemon juice and coriander for garnish
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds, onions, chili, and peas
Mix in the poha and stir gently
Garnish with lemon juice and coriander

name: Masala Idli
description: Fried idli cubes tossed with spices and vegetables
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Toss in idli cubes and mix well

name: Muesli with Yogurt
description: A crunchy and creamy blend of oats, nuts, fruits, and yogurt
instructions: In a bowl, mix muesli and yogurt
Add chopped fruits and drizzle honey

name: Greek Salad
description: Crisp veggies, olives, and feta tossed in a lemon vinaigrette
instructions: Combine all chopped vegetables and feta in a bowl
Drizzle olive oil and lemon juice

name: Chickpea Salad
description: Protein-rich salad with chickpeas, tomatoes, and herbs
instructions: Mix chickpeas, tomato, onion, and parsley
Add lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper

name: Quinoa & Avocado Salad
description: Fresh and filling salad with quinoa, avocado, and veggies
instructions: In a bowl, mix all ingredients
Drizzle with lime juice and olive oil

name: Cucumber Yogurt Salad
description: Cool and creamy salad perfect for summer
instructions: Mix cucumber with yogurt and cumin
Garnish with mint leaves and serve chilled

name: Beetroot Apple Salad
description: Sweet and tangy salad with beets and apples
instructions: Add lemon juice, salt, and pepper

name: Buddha Bowl
description: Colorful bowl with grains, veggies, and tahini dressing
instructions: Arrange quinoa, chickpeas, broccoli, carrots, and avocado in a bowl
Mix tahini, lemon juice, and salt for the dressing

name: Mexican Burrito Bowl
description: Southwest-style bowl with rice, beans, corn, and salsa
instructions: Layer rice, beans, corn, salsa, and avocado in a bowl
Serve with tortilla chips if desired

name: Mediterranean Bowl
description: Fresh Mediterranean ingredients in a healthy bowl
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions
Whisk oil, lemon juice, and oregano

name: Peanut Tofu Rice Bowl
description: Protein-packed tofu bowl with creamy peanut sauce
instructions: Whisk peanut butter, soy sauce, lime juice, and water to make sauce
Assemble rice, tofu, and veggies in a bowl

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza with fresh basil and mozzarella
instructions: Top with fresh basil before serving

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with classic Caesar dressing
instructions: Whisk together oil, lemon juice, mustard, and garlic
Season dressing with salt and pepper

name: Bruschetta
description: Italian appetizer with tomatoes, basil, and garlic
instructions: Add olive oil and balsamic vinegar

name: Chocolate Avocado Mousse
description: Rich and creamy chocolate mousse made with avocados
instructions: Add cocoa powder and maple syrup
Serve with chocolate shavings and berries

name: Chickpea Curry
description: Spicy Indian chickpea curry with aromatic spices
instructions: Heat oil in a large pan
Add garlic and ginger, cook 1 minute

name: Hummus
description: Creamy Middle Eastern chickpea dip
instructions: Garnish with paprika and pine nuts

name: Poke Bowl
description: Hawaiian-inspired bowl with fresh vegetables
instructions: Cook sushi rice according to package
Mix soy sauce, vinegar, and sesame oil

name: Guacamole
description: Mexican avocado dip with lime and cilantro
instructions: Mix in onion, tomato, and garlic
Cover with plastic wrap if storing

name: Ratatouille
description: French vegetable stew with herbs de Provence
instructions: Salt eggplant and let drain 30 minutes
Heat oil in large Dutch oven

name: Quinoa Salad
description: Nutritious quinoa salad with fresh vegetables
instructions: Cook quinoa in broth until tender
Whisk oil, lemon juice, and oregano

name: Overnight Oats
description: Make-ahead breakfast oats with berries
instructions: Combine oats, milk, and chia seeds

name: Acai Bowl
description: Antioxidant-rich Brazilian superfood bowl
instructions: Blend acai packets with apple juice
Add half the banana to blend
Drizzle with honey and almond butter

name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
description: Creamy hot dip with spinach and artichokes
instructions: Mix cream cheese, mayo, and sour cream
Add garlic and half the cheeses

name: Panna Cotta
description: Italian vanilla custard dessert
instructions: Heat cream and sugar in saucepan

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy Italian rice dish with mushrooms
instructions: Sauté mushrooms until golden, set aside
Stir in mushrooms, butter, and cheese

name: Asian Slaw
description: Crunchy Asian-inspired coleslaw
instructions: Combine cabbage, carrots, and bell pepper
Whisk vinegar, sesame oil, and soy sauce
Add honey and ginger to dressing

name: Smoothie Bowl
description: Thick smoothie bowl with fresh toppings
instructions: Sprinkle with coconut and chia seeds

name: Mexican Bowl
description: Spicy Mexican-inspired bowl with black beans
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions
Heat beans with cumin and chili powder
Mix lime juice with olive oil
Top with beans, corn, and pepper

name: Stuffed Mushrooms
description: Cheese and herb stuffed button mushrooms
instructions: Mix in cream cheese and olive oil

name: Vegetable Paella
description: Spanish rice dish with saffron and vegetables
instructions: Add tomatoes and cook until thick
Add green beans and lima beans
Rest 5 minutes, garnish with lemon and parsley

name: Waldorf Salad
description: Classic American salad with apples and walnuts
instructions: Dice apples and toss with lemon juice
Season dressing with salt and pepper

name: Chia Pudding
description: Nutritious chia seed pudding with berries
instructions: Whisk chia seeds with almond milk

name: Thai Green Bowl
description: Fresh Thai-inspired bowl with herbs and vegetables
instructions: Mix lime juice, fish sauce, and sugar

name: Baba Ganoush
description: Smoky Middle Eastern eggplant dip
instructions: Let cool, then scoop out flesh
Mix in tahini and lemon juice

name: Cucumber Salad
description: Refreshing cucumber salad with dill
instructions: Salt cucumbers and let drain 15 minutes
Toss cucumbers and onion with dressing

name: Granola
description: Homemade crunchy granola with nuts and dried fruit
instructions: Mix oats, nuts, and pumpkin seeds
Warm honey, maple syrup, and coconut oil

name: Indian Curry Bowl
description: Aromatic Indian curry bowl with basmati rice
instructions: Heat coconut oil in large pan

name: Apple Crisp
description: Warm apple crisp with oat topping
instructions: Toss sliced apples with lemon juice
Place apples in greased baking dish
Mix oats, flour, brown sugar, and spices
Cut in cold butter until crumbly

name: Kale Salad
description: Massaged kale salad with lemon vinaigrette
instructions: Remove stems from kale and chop
Massage kale with hands for 2 minutes
Whisk lemon juice, oil, and mustard

name: Yogurt Parfait
description: Layered yogurt parfait with berries and granola
instructions: Mix yogurt with honey and vanilla
Top with nuts and chia seeds

name: Teriyaki Bowl
description: Japanese-inspired bowl with teriyaki vegetables
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions
Mix soy sauce, mirin, brown sugar, and cornstarch
Add ginger and garlic to sauce
Garnish with sesame seeds and green onions

name: Cheese Quesadilla
description: Crispy tortilla filled with melted cheese
instructions: Serve with sour cream, salsa, and guacamole

name: Caprese Stuffed Portobello
description: Grilled portobello mushrooms with caprese filling
instructions: Remove mushroom stems and scrape gills
Mix olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper
Top with tomato and mozzarella slices
Grill 2-3 minutes more until cheese melts

name: Spinach Salad
description: Fresh spinach salad with strawberries and feta
instructions: Whisk vinegar, oil, honey, and mustard
Season dressing with salt and pepper
Toss with dressing just before serving

name: Power Bowl
description: Nutrient-dense bowl with superfoods
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions
Roast cubed sweet potato at 400°F for 20 minutes
Massage kale with a pinch of salt
Mix tahini, lemon juice, maple syrup, and garlic
Add water to reach desired consistency
Top with kale, sweet potato, and avocado

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
description: Bell peppers stuffed with rice and vegetables
ingredients: 4 large bell peppers, tops cut off
instructions: Remove seeds and membranes from peppers
Heat olive oil in large skillet
Mix in cooked rice and half the cheese
Place in baking dish with water

name: Coleslaw
description: Creamy traditional coleslaw
instructions: Add celery seed, salt, and pepper

name: Muesli
description: Swiss-style breakfast cereal with oats and fruit
instructions: Mix oats, nuts, and sunflower seeds
Grate apple and toss with lemon juice

name: Grain Bowl
description: Wholesome grain bowl with mixed vegetables
instructions: Season dressing with salt and pepper
Arrange grains and greens in bowls
Top with beet slices and tomatoes

name: Jalapeño Poppers
description: Spicy jalapeños stuffed with cream cheese
instructions: Stuff pepper halves with cheese mixture

name: Beet Salad
description: Colorful roasted beet salad with goat cheese
instructions: Season dressing with salt and pepper

name: Caprese Skewers
description: Mini caprese salad on skewers
instructions: Thread tomato, basil, and mozzarella on skewers

name: Ice Cream Sundae
description: Classic ice cream sundae with toppings

name: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
description: Fresh quinoa salad with Mediterranean flavors
instructions: Cook quinoa in vegetable broth until tender
Mix cucumber, tomatoes, onion, and olives
Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano

name: Greek Village Salad
description: Traditional Greek salad with tomatoes, cucumber, and feta

name: Mexican Rice Bowl
description: Spicy rice bowl with black beans and avocado
instructions: Cook rice according to package directions

name: Vegetable Curry
description: Aromatic Indian curry with mixed vegetables

name: Thai Coconut Curry Bowl
description: Fragrant Thai curry with vegetables and jasmine rice
instructions: Add bell pepper and green beans
Season with fish sauce and sugar
Serve over rice with basil and lime

name: Spinach and Artichoke Dip
description: Creamy hot dip with spinach and artichoke hearts
instructions: Mix cream cheese, mayo, sour cream
Add garlic and half the parmesan
Top with remaining cheese and bake 25 mins

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Classic homemade chocolate chip cookies

name: Lemon Bars
description: Tangy lemon bars with buttery shortbread crust
instructions: Mix flour, powdered sugar, butter for crust
Beat eggs, sugar, flour, lemon juice

name: Asian Cucumber Salad
description: Refreshing cucumber salad with Asian flavors
instructions: Whisk vinegar, oil, sugar, soy sauce
Add red pepper flakes to taste

name: Quinoa Tabbouleh
description: Middle Eastern salad with quinoa instead of bulgur
instructions: Cook quinoa in broth until tender
Whisk lemon juice and olive oil

name: Hummus Platter
description: Creamy hummus served with vegetables and pita

name: Crème Brûlée
description: Classic French custard with caramelized sugar top
instructions: Slowly add hot cream to yolks
Chill, then caramelize sugar on top

name: Caprese Pasta
description: Fresh pasta with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil

name: Breakfast Burrito
description: Scrambled eggs with vegetables wrapped in tortilla
instructions: Add eggs and vegetables to tortillas

name: Vietnamese Pho Bowl
description: Aromatic noodle soup with vegetables and herbs
instructions: Add mushrooms and pour hot broth
Garnish with herbs and bean sprouts

name: Mozzarella Sticks
description: Crispy breaded mozzarella with marinara sauce

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Individual chocolate cakes with molten center
instructions: Invert and serve with ice cream

name: Mushroom Stroganoff
description: Creamy mushroom sauce over egg noodles
instructions: Stir in sour cream and dill

name: Beet and Goat Cheese Salad
description: Roasted beets with creamy goat cheese and walnuts
instructions: Let cool, then peel and slice
Season dressing with salt and pepper
Top with beets and goat cheese
Drizzle with dressing and add walnuts

name: Ethiopian Injera Bowl
description: Spiced lentils and vegetables served on injera bread
instructions: Cook lentils in broth until tender
Add berbere spice and cook 1 minute
Add cooked lentils to spice mixture

name: Stuffed Dates
description: Medjool dates stuffed with nuts and cheese
instructions: Mix goat cheese with orange zest

name: Fattoush Salad
description: Middle Eastern salad with crispy pita and sumac
instructions: Toast pita until crispy, break into pieces
Season dressing with salt and pepper
Add crispy pita just before serving

name: Breakfast Quinoa Bowl
description: Protein-rich quinoa with fruits and nuts
instructions: Sprinkle with almonds and chia seeds

name: Peruvian Quinoa Bowl
description: Quinoa bowl with Peruvian flavors and aji verde
instructions: Add garlic to aji verde sauce
Top with sweet potato and beans

name: Spinach Artichoke Flatbread
description: Crispy flatbread topped with spinach artichoke mixture

name: Mushroom Barley Risotto
description: Creamy barley cooked risotto-style with mushrooms
instructions: In same pan, cook onion and garlic

name: Thai Papaya Salad
description: Spicy and tangy green papaya salad
instructions: Add lime juice, fish sauce, sugar

name: Brazilian Açaí Bowl
description: Traditional Brazilian açaí bowl with tropical fruits

name: Hummus Trio
description: Three flavored hummus varieties with fresh vegetables
instructions: Make classic hummus with 1/3 chickpeas, tahini, lemon, garlic
Make red pepper hummus by adding roasted peppers
Make herb hummus with sun-dried tomatoes and herbs
Blend each until smooth, adding water as needed
Arrange vegetables and pita around bowls

name: Deviled Potatoes
description: Vegan twist on deviled eggs using baby potatoes
instructions: Boil potatoes until tender, about 20 minutes
Let cool, then cut in half lengthwise
Scoop out centers, leaving shells intact
Mash potato centers with vegan mayo
Add mustard, nutritional yeast, and turmeric
Season with pickle juice, salt, and pepper
Pipe or spoon mixture back into potato shells

name: Spring Rolls
description: Fresh rice paper rolls with vegetables and herbs
instructions: Soak rice paper in warm water until soft
Place lettuce in center of each wrapper
Make dipping sauce with peanut butter, soy sauce, vinegar

name: Cauliflower Wings
description: Crispy battered cauliflower with buffalo sauce
ingredients: 1 large cauliflower head, cut into florets
instructions: Mix flour, plant milk, and garlic powder for batter
Mix buffalo sauce with melted vegan butter
Toss baked cauliflower in buffalo sauce
Serve with celery sticks and ranch

name: Avocado Toast Bites
description: Mini avocado toasts with various toppings
instructions: Mash avocados with lemon juice and salt
Spread avocado mixture on toast rounds
Top some with cherry tomato halves
Top with radish slices and microgreens
Season with sea salt and pepper

name: Roasted Red Pepper Dip
description: Smoky roasted pepper dip with walnuts
instructions: Roast bell peppers over open flame until charred
Place in bag to steam, then peel off skin
Blend roasted peppers with walnuts and garlic
Add olive oil and lemon juice
Season with paprika, cumin, salt, and pepper
Garnish with parsley and serve with crackers

name: Mushroom Pâté
description: Rich mushroom pâté with herbs and wine
instructions: Sauté onion in olive oil until translucent
Add mushrooms and cook until liquid evaporates
Pour in white wine and let reduce
Blend with toasted walnuts until smooth

name: Zucchini Fritters
description: Crispy zucchini fritters with herbs
ingredients: 2 tbsp ground flaxseed mixed with 6 tbsp water
instructions: Grate zucchini and toss with salt
Let drain 15 minutes, then squeeze out excess water
Mix flaxseed with water, let sit 5 minutes
Combine zucchini with flour and flax mixture
Add dill, green onions, garlic, and pepper
Drop spoonfuls of mixture into hot oil
Fry 3-4 minutes per side until golden

name: Olive Tapenade
description: Mediterranean olive spread with capers and herbs
instructions: Combine olives, capers, and garlic in food processor
Add olive oil and lemon juice
Stir in fresh thyme and pepper
